McCaffrey, Anne

Anne McCaffrey published 'Dragonflight', the first book in the 'Dragonriders of Pern' series, in 1968. It was an expansion on two earlier novellas, 'Weyr Search' (which won the 1968 Hugo Award for best science fiction novella) and 'Dragonrider' (which won the 1969 Nebula Award).
